name: bettermath
description: Basic Mathematical Operations for Arrays in Javascript

scripts.docs: docco -t node_modules/tonys-cool-docco-theme/dist/docco.jst -c node_modules/tonys-cool-docco-theme/dist/docco.css -o docs/ bettermath.js && mv docs/bettermath.html docs/index.html
scripts.all: npm run docs && npm run release

author: Tony Boyles
